files.patch:
@@ -345,0 +345,5 @@
+        applyIf = {"AlignVector", "false"},
+        applyIfCPUFeatureOr = {"sse4.1", "true", "asimd", "true"})
+    // Some aarch64 machines have AlignVector == true, like ThunderX2
+    @IR(failOn = {IRNode.LOAD_VECTOR, IRNode.STORE_VECTOR},
+        applyIf = {"AlignVector", "true"},
@@ -360,0 +365,5 @@
+        applyIf = {"AlignVector", "false"},
+        applyIfCPUFeatureOr = {"sse4.1", "true", "asimd", "true"})
+    // Some aarch64 machines have AlignVector == true, like ThunderX2
+    @IR(failOn = {IRNode.LOAD_VECTOR, IRNode.STORE_VECTOR},
+        applyIf = {"AlignVector", "true"},
